Posts.Content: Thank you so much Teresa. I will check this website out. I would love to hear more from you if you dont mind. I have called several places regarding additional supplements, foods, etc and have read everything. My personal email address is --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---- if you dont mind emailing me directly. Thank you!
Posts.Title: Pregnancy and Class 3 Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Hi, I am 36 years old and was diagnosed with class 3 infilitrating ductile carcinoma on 6/6/06. I was scheduled for a mastectomy this morning (6/22) but the pregnancy test came back positive and the surgery was postponed. I apparently conceived a few days before being informed of the breast cancer. I have no clue what to do? I see the oncologist tomorrow to discuss our options. Has anyone ever experienced this issue or have any information regarding this issue, pregnancy and breast cancer? THANK YOU! LOOKING FORWARD TO HEARING FROM SOMEONE!
Posts.Title: Pregnancy and Class 3 Breast Cancer
